chunks.text:
Thank you for contacting SkyCargo CASA.

Kindly proceed & file an online claim/intent on our website <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/fzeeC6zPJSxJw4Mh6hYi5rXj5?domain=eskycargo.emirates.com> . You can follow the below steps: 

1.	Register/Login to e-SkyCargo.
2.	Select the e-SkyCargo tab, click on Customer Relations & proceed to file your complaint.
3.	If any further support to file a complaint needed, please follow the steps in the  related e-SkyCargo Training <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/xPC2C7WQKc9Y7BySBiZioud3z?domain=skycargo.com> 

On submission, you’ll receive a Cargo Claim Reference Number (CRN) which you can use to track the progress of the complaint. 

If the issue persists, please do not hesitate to re-contact us & share a related screenshot of the system issue you are facing to advise accordingly.


With Regards,
SkyCargo CASA team
  



--------------- Original Message ---------------
From: Navtech International [navtech.uae@eim.ae]
Sent: 30/07/2025 14:30
To: maria.khan@aas-shipping.com; aas-shipping@pec.it; skychainsupport@emirates.com; ali.khan@aas-shipping.com; skycargodxb@emirates.com; bineesh.balakrishnan@aas-shipping.com; skycargocustomerrelations@emirates.com
